front.title: A Model for IPv6 Operation in OpenStack

abstract.t: This is an overview of a network model for OpenStack, designed to dramatically simplify scalable network deployment and operations. Requirements Language The key words 'MUST', 'MUST NOT', 'REQUIRED', 'SHALL', 'SHALL NOT', 'SHOULD', 'SHOULD NOT', 'RECOMMENDED', 'MAY', and 'OPTIONAL' in this document are to be interpreted as described in [RFC2119].
